dict.string: - Leopard only: new Profile stat - per-session new artists. - The complete play history can be viewed for tracks in the Local Charts. - The Statistics window is gone. Everything it did was available elsewhere. - Artist Details are now displayed in separate windows instead of drawers. - Radio controls are disabled while waiting for a response from Last.fm. - Added 'skip current track' Applescript command. - Bug Fixes for ApplesScript on Leopard, Radio, and iTunes import.
